1{-# LANGUAGE RecordWildCards #-}
2{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
3
4-- | Cache.
5
6module Koshucode.Baala.Overture.Cache
7 ( -- * Example
8   -- $Example
9
10   -- * Library
11   Cache,
12   CacheS,
13   cache,
14   cacheGet,
15   cacheGetList,
16 ) where
17
18import qualified Data.Map.Strict  as Ms
19
20-- $Example
21--
22-- Create cache data with limit upto 3 elements
23-- and identity value function.
24--
25--   > let cc0 = cache [3] id :: Cache String String
26--
27-- Get cached values.
28--
29--   > let (cc1, v1) = cacheGet cc0 "a"
30--   > let (cc2, v2) = cacheGet cc1 "b"
31--   > let (cc3, v3) = cacheGet cc2 "a"
32--   > let (cc4, v4) = cacheGet cc3 "c"
33--   > let (cc5, v5) = cacheGet cc4 "d"
34--   > let (cc6, v6) = cacheGet cc5 "b"
35--
36-- Show the values.
37--
38--   >>> [v1,v2,v3,v4,v5,v6]
39--   ["a","b","a","c","d","b"]
40--
41-- Show the caches.
42--
43--   >>> cc0
44--   Cache 3 [][]
45--   >>> cc1
46--   Cache 3 ["a"][]
47--   >>> cc2
48--   Cache 3 ["a","b"][]
49--   >>> cc3
50--   Cache 3 ["a","b"][]
51--   >>> cc4
52--   Cache 3 ["a","b","c"][]
53--   >>> cc5
54--   Cache 3 ["d"]["a","b","c"]
55--   >>> cc6
56--   Cache 3 ["b","d"]["a","b","c"]
57
58-- | Cache data.
59data Cache k v = Cache
60    { cacheVal       :: k -> v      -- ^ Value function
61    , cacheLimit     :: Int         -- ^ Current size limit
62    , cacheLimits    :: [Int]       -- ^ Extended limits
63    , cacheA         :: Ms.Map k v  -- ^ Current cache map
64    , cacheB         :: Ms.Map k v  -- ^ Previous cache map
65    }
66
67instance (Show k) => Show (Cache k v) where
68    show Cache {..} = "Cache " ++ show cacheLimit ++ " "
69                      ++ show (Ms.keys cacheA) ++ " "
70                      ++ show (Ms.keys cacheB)
71
72-- | String cache.
73type CacheS v = Cache String v
74
75-- | Create empty cache of given limits and value function.
76cache :: [Int] -> (k -> v) -> Cache k v
77cache (l:ls) = cacheWith l ls
78cache []     = cache (cube <$> [2 .. 16])
79
80cube :: (Num n) => n -> n
81cube n = n * n * n
82
83cacheWith :: Int -> [Int] -> (k -> v) -> Cache k v
84cacheWith l ls val =
85    Cache { cacheVal     = val
86          , cacheLimit   = l
87          , cacheLimits  = ls
88          , cacheA       = Ms.empty
89          , cacheB       = Ms.empty }
90
91-- | Get cached value.
92cacheGet :: (Ord k) => Cache k v -> k -> (Cache k v, v)
93cacheGet cc@Cache {..} k =
94    case Ms.lookup k cacheA of
95      Just v -> (cc, v)
96      Nothing -> case Ms.lookup k cacheB of
97                   Just v  -> put v
98                   Nothing -> put $ cacheVal k
99    where
100      put v | Ms.size cacheA < cacheLimit =
101                let cc' = cc { cacheA = Ms.insert k v cacheA }
102                in (cc', v)
103            | otherwise = 
104                let cc' = cc { cacheA = Ms.singleton k v
105                             , cacheB = cacheA }
106                in (nextLimit cc', v)
107
108-- | Update size limit.
109nextLimit :: Cache k v -> Cache k v
110nextLimit cc@Cache{ cacheLimits = [] } = cc
111nextLimit cc@Cache{ cacheLimits = l : ls } =
112    cc { cacheLimit = l, cacheLimits = ls }
113
114-- | Get cached values.
115--
116--   >>> cacheGetList (cache [] id :: Cache Char Char) ['A' .. 'Z']
117--   (Cache 27 "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQR" "STUVWXYZ", "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ")
118--
119cacheGetList :: (Ord k) => Cache k v -> [k] -> (Cache k v, [v])
120cacheGetList cc0 = foldr get (cc0, []) where
121    get k (cc, vs) = case cacheGet cc k of
122                       (cc', v) -> (cc', v : vs)
123
